StrictMode
You should avoid performing long running operations on the UI thread. This includes file and network access.
To ensure this you can use _StrictMode_ . StrictMode is available as of API 9 (Android 2.3.3) and allows to setup thread policies for your application.
Via _StrictMode_ you can instruct the Android system to crash your application if it performs long running operations, e.g. I/O in the user interface thread.
